import{apiFetch}from"./api";export async function createAdminUser(payload){return apiFetch("/api/admin/users",{method:"POST",body:JSON.stringify(payload)});}export async function patchAdminUser(userId,payload){return apiFetch("/api/admin/users/".concat(userId),{method:"PATCH",body:JSON.stringify(payload)});}export async function updateAdminUserFull(userId,payload){return apiFetch("/api/admin/users/".concat(userId,"/full"),{method:"PUT",body:JSON.stringify(payload)});}export async function deleteAdminUser(userId){return apiFetch("/api/admin/users/".concat(userId),{method:"DELETE"});}/**
 * ✅ NOWE: update własnych danych przez PATCH /api/me
 * (AuthController::updateMe)
 */export async function updateMe(payload){return apiFetch("/api/me",{method:"PATCH",body:JSON.stringify(payload)});}
